entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
